original_text: Jesus knew what these men were thinking. He told them, ‘You should not be thinking these things.
korean_text: 예수께서 그 생각을 아시고 대답하여 이르시되 너희 마음에 무슨 생각을 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus knew what these men were thinking
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 이 사람들이 무엇을 생각하고 있는지 알고 계셨다

sentences.original_text: 'You should not be thinking these things'
